text: When is this issue going to get resolved?
<@U2H1Q3F8R>, yes I know this site, but seems that as much as customers we pay there should be more a timeframe when unexpected breaks to a complete system like this happens
looks like it's back up now
Wasn't a HubSpot problem, was a Cloudflare issue.

We are honestly sorry for the disqualification of the previous overall winner. At the same time, we are unbelievably happy to be next in line to receive this amazing price!! We congratulate all other winners of this challenge and thank HubSpot for this great platform. We wish you all happy holidays and a happy new year. Stay healthy. All the best, <@UHDEVB0S1> & Ergün
